scripts.build: npm run copy && sed -n -i '/<!-- dev -->/!p' dist/index.html && npm run build-css && npm run build-es2015 && npm run build-js && rm -rf es2015
scripts.build-css: npm run concat-css && npm run uglify-css && rm dist/style.css
scripts.build-js: echo '/* eslint-disable */' > dist/bundle.js && npx browserify ./es2015/**.js | npx uglify-js -mc warnings=false >> dist/bundle.js
scripts.concat-css: cp public/style.css dist && find src -type f -name '*.css' -exec cat {} ';' >> dist/style.css
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist; mkdir dist; cp public/* dist; cp node_modules/hyperhtml/umd.js dist/hyperhtml.min.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d dist
scripts.start: npm run copy && npm run concat-css && sed -n -i '/<!-- prod -->/!p' dist/index.html && npm run serve
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
